description:
Amandara Kamandara is a wealthy trader who sells goods to the Poseidal Military while also secretly providing goods to the rebel factions rebelling against Poseidal. He first appears when Daba attempts to return a cash card to him so as to fulfill a dying man`s last request, and shows up at various times throughout the conflict to encounter Daba and the others and provide advice and assistance.
He is in reality, the true Oldna Poseidal, hiding as a merchant while a former lover of his, Mian Ku Ha Attsher acts as a puppet of his on the throne. Through the power bio-relation he has eternal youth, which he has also provided to Mian and former lover Full Flat. Using bio-relation he possesses strong control over Mian but as the conflict intensifies his ability to control her fades and he returns to Gastogal. There he reveals his true nature and acquires his Heavy Metal, the Original Auge. Battling Daba`s L-Gaim Mark II, he is virtually invincible until Mian is able to disable the bio-relation, causing him to immediately age to his death.
name: Amandara Kamandara
